original: Andersson, Lars Albin, agronom, Varberg, f. 12/9/87 i Tvååker, Hall. 1., av lantbr. Anders Börjesson o. Olivia Svensson. G. 28 m. Karin Bäckström. Barn: Lars f. 29. — Agronomex. v. Alnarp 17. Res. t. Danm., Norge o. Finl. v. ohka tillf. Lär. v. Herrljunga lantm:sik. 18-23, v. Kristinehamns la’nt-m:sk. 24-25, v. Bollnäs lantm:sk. 26-28, ungd:konsul. i Hall. 1. sed. 28. V. ordf. i Sv. ungd:konsul. fören. 28-44, ordf. där sed. 46, ordf. i Mell. Hall. lantbr-klubb sed. 43, led. av styr. f. Hall. länsförb. av RLF sed. 30 o. av styr. f. Hall. 1. fören :nd sed. 40, sekr. i Hall. 1. fjäderfäavelsfören. sed. 38, led. av styr. f. Hall. distr. av JUF sed. 27. Skr.: Mell. Hallands lantbruks-klubbs 60-års historia (tills. m. intend. Albert Sandklef 36) samt ett flert. art. i tidn. o. facktidskr. JUF förtj :Gm.
translated: Andersson, Lars Albin, agronom (agricultural scientist), Varberg, born September 12, 1887 in Tvååker, Halland, first son of farmer Anders Börjesson and Olivia Svensson. Married to Karin Bäckström on March 28, with one child named Lars (born in 1929). Graduated as an agronomist from Alnarp in 1917. Worked in Denmark, Norway, and Finland. Taught at Herrljunga Lantmanson (agricultural high school) from 1918-1923, Kristinehamns Lantmansskola from 1924-1925, Bollnäs Lantmanson from 1926-1928. He became the youth consul in Halland in 1928. Vice chairman of the Swedish youth consul association from 1928-1944, serving as chairman from 1946. Chairman of the Mid-Halland Agricultural Club since 1944, member of the board of the Halland County Cooperative Association since 1930, and member of the board of the Halland Poultry Breeders Association since 1938. Also served on the board of JUF. Wrote Mell. Hallands Lantbruksklubbs 60-års Historia (together with interviewer Albert Sandklef in 1936) and several articles in JUF magazine and other professional journals. Recipient of the JUF medal of merit.
